description: Charlottetown Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, has a requirement to purchase 1(one)  Microtox LX Analyzer. THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES. Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.
duration_in_months: The purchase is expected to occur within *623* months.
full_summary:
### Purchase of Microtox LX Analyzer
#### Solicitation Number: 01B46-23-055
#### Reference Number: CB-6317-1079718

The **Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada** at the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre is issuing a tender to purchase one (1) Microtox LX Analyzer. The solicitation number is **01B46-23-055**, with a reference number of **CB-6317-1079718**.

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: June 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 20, 2023, at 2 pm (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 27, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

The procurement method is competitive, with selective tendering, and the selection criteria is based on the lowest price. The trade agreement applicable to this tender is the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

#### Tender Requirements

The bidder must have a documented supply arrangement with Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, specifically # E60PV-19EQUI, related to Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts, and Accessories, Services, and Supplies.

#### Tender Documents

The tender notice and accompanying documents are available for downloading from the Canada Buys website. Interested bidders can also contact:

Jacques Toussaint
Email: [aacfeuroprocurement-cseapprovisionnementaggc.ac](mailto:aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca)
Phone: (438) 455-8239

#### Attachment

The tender notice and its supporting documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/‌​tender_notice/6317/npp--e60pv-19equi.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/‌​webform/tender_notice/6317/apm---e60pv-19equi.pdf>

#### Note

The tender closing date and time are fixed and cannot be extended. Bidders must meet the deadline to be considered for the award of the contract. Only bidders meeting the requirements will be contacted for further information.  All other information can be found in the attached tender notice and supporting documents. ## Step 1
